chapter.title: JBoss Messaging Installation
chapter.para: This section describes procedures on how to install JBoss Messaging both standalone and within JBoss AS 5

section.title: Installing JBoss Messaging standalone
section.para: After downloading the distribution unzip it into your chosen directory. At this point it should be possible to run straight of the box, the following describes the directory structure that should be seen
section.programlisting: |-- bin |-- config |-- lib |-- docs | |-- api | `-- userguide `-- examples

listitem.para: This contains the binaries and scripts needed to run JBM.
This contains configuration files needed to configure JBM. Refer to the configuration chapter for details on how to do this.
This contains jars needed to run JBM.
This contains this user guide and the JBM Javadocs..
This contains a set of examples. Refer to the 'running examples' chapter for details on how to run them.

section.title: Installing JBoss Messaging in JBoss AS 5
section.para: At this point JBoss Messaging 2 Alpha is a technology preview and we only support the standalone or embedded runs.
